summary: When a Spanish student needs money for her senior trip, she applies for a babysitting job, unaware of the circumstances. Can she stay alive, save her best friend, and still make her senior trip?
cast: Ana Turpin|Ona Casamiquela|Luisa Gavasa|Jesús Caba|Sheila Ponce|Javier Pereira|Pep Anton Muñoz|Enrique Villén|Pablo Viña|Frederic Tomàs|Rafa Núñez|Daniela Costa|Abraham Mestre|Oscar Salcedo|Sandra Soler Peyton
title: Para Elisa
